meta.title: How to create Dynamic Menus
meta.keyword: Your Second Keyword and so on

body.p: It is very easy to organize your pages and menus. XMLNuke have GROUPS and GROUPKEYWORDs that is used to create them.
When you create a group (see Admin Tool), you specify a KEYWORD. The default keyword is all. It means only groups containing the "ALL" keyword makes the menu visible.
If you setup another value to the keyword, the menu becomes invisible. Only pages with the tag <GROUPKEYWORD> can then activate it.
Select the menu on the left side. You can see 'Page one' and 'Page two'. through them you'll be able to access two pages of this hidden menu.
